name: Project Police - Escape
description:
GAME INFO

A fun and eccentric, top-down, police chase game where you can play with a choice of several cars in order to survive for as long as possible and get a high score!  You are awarded points for movement and police K.Os, the time is something you may want to beat in every match. You then can use the points to unlock cars which allow you to destroy enemies easier or escape much quicker! The cars of choice are:

    -Basic car

    -"Better car"

    -Muscle car

    -Race car

    -Garbage truck

Possible enemies are:

    -Default police

    -Police truck

    -Military truck

!IMPORTANT NOTICE!!

The game isn't perfect. You may experience some errors with the movement or things I am unaware of. I may or may not continue to update the game, but I possibly will act upon any feedback which is given. If the game turns out to be a popular masterpiece I will continue with it's development, but I am only one man.

The game was a project which was taken too far, I feel it was too ambitious for just me.

-Addicta
